description:
Is there a school-system aspect to the third season of "American Horror Story," subtitled "Coven"? It would seem so, based on the first promo that has been released for the upcoming season. 《美国恐怖故事第三季：巫师集会》里真的会有巫师学校吗？从刚发布的这段宣传片里看起来...似乎是真的。

Above, the promo is titled "Detention" and features a group of young women who seem to be in a sort of time-out ... suspended on the walls of a large room. Is there a school for witches? That would be kind of cool. The Facebook post is captioned, "This October. . .lift your spirits."上面这个名为《拘留》的宣传片中，我们看到一些衣着风格老旧的年轻女性...被挂在一个很大的房间里。难道这里就是巫师学校？那就太酷了。该片在Facebook上发布的时候写着“今年10月...升起你的灵魂。”

Creepy teases leading up to "American Horror Story's" Season 3 premiere in October on FX.这段极其恐怖诡异的宣传片是不是让你对今年10月FX电视台的《美国恐怖故事》第三季充满了期待。

title: 《美国恐怖故事》第三季诡异预告片
